channel.description: Recent content in databases on Tom Houle's homepage

item.title: March 2022 readings
item.description: Slow month, from the readings angle. But there’s been some side project movement I hope will result in something publishable and at least one blog post. General Programming Re-watched “Performance Matters” by Emery Berger, strange loop 2019. Two tools to keep in mind for next time profiling: STABILIZER tool to minimize the effect of memory layout on performance Causal profiling C-Reduce, paper and slides. Cool! Databases The Adaptive Radix Tree: ARTful Indexing for Main-Memory Databases by Leis, Kemper and Neumann.
